title: Precision Immunization: NASA Studies Immune Response to Flu Vaccine
author: Kelli Mars
description: NASA Human Research Program Twins Study investigator Emmanuel Mignot, M.D., Ph.D, known for discovering the cause of narcolepsy is related to the immune system, is studying twin astronauts Scott and Mark Kelly. He's investigating how their immune system responds to the seasonal flu vaccine over the course of a year in space and on Earth to possibly
